about_the_game:
Roxas Flare starts his day like any other but what danger lies inside this reality that he calls home.

Starting with headaches and a voice inside his head, Roxas must journey with close battlemates and newly acquired allies to save the land of Serith. For not all seems right in this noble land, for what is and what isn't, IS the real question.

Just another day to wake up to, another day of fighting to protect, another day for new attachments. Another day of finding the truth.

Uncovering the mysteries is the ultimate adventure and the journey has only just begun!
detailed_description:
Roxas Flare starts his day like any other but what danger lies inside this reality that he calls home.

Starting with headaches and a voice inside his head, Roxas must journey with close battlemates and newly acquired allies to save the land of Serith. For not all seems right in this noble land, for what is and what isn't, IS the real question.

Just another day to wake up to, another day of fighting to protect, another day for new attachments. Another day of finding the truth.

Uncovering the mysteries is the ultimate adventure and the journey has only just begun!
name: Eternal Fate: A Journey Begins Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium IV
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Headphones or speakers
  • Additional Notes: Created using RPG Maker MV. Always save your games.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Headphones or speakers
  • Additional Notes: Save on more than 1 file.

short_description: Old-school style RPG to enjoy a nostalgic tale with difficult and fair gameplay that is fully voiced.
